attributes.action: government and council forms are confusing
attributes.additional_details: The forms that an ordinary layperson is expected to understand and complete are confusing and there should be a dedicated Help Team to help people. I never had this help and was fobbed off and passed onto the Council who have equally confusing forms. As a consequence I am standing trial on 7th September being sued by the Council being accused of fraud!  I was a mature University student and it is sending out a very negative message. I know I am not the only one. Its too beaurocratic.
